document_data.name: Varin Chalgash
document_data.mainbody: '''Varin Chalgash''' was a [[wererat]] thug and a high-ranking member of the [[Dead Rats]] gang in [[Neverwinter]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Varin was an elite defender of the Dead Rats lair in the [[Blacklake Sewers]] beneath [[Blacklake District]].
document_data.Description: Varin was much larger and bulkier than regular wererats, probably having come from a larger non-[[human]] race. Varin wore ornate golden-and-teal-hued armor.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Varin and four regular wererats defended a passage into their sewer lair against an [[adventurer]] sent to free [[Gothwan Cooper]], a [[Nashers]] thief whom the Dead Rats had kidnapped. Varin was slain in the confrontation.
